metadata.Title: CVE-2019-8357 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in SoX 14.4.2. lsx_make_lpf in effect_i_dsp.c allows a NULL pointer dereference. It was discovered that SoX incorrectly handled certain MP3 files. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service. (CVE-2019-8354, CVE-2019-8355, CVE-2019-8356, CVE-2019-8357)

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-8357` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsox-fmt-all - 14.4.2+git20190427-1
libsox-fmt-alsa - 14.4.2+git20190427-1
libsox-fmt-ao - 14.4.2+git20190427-1
libsox-fmt-base - 14.4.2+git20190427-1
libsox-fmt-mp3 - 14.4.2+git20190427-1
libsox-fmt-oss - 14.4.2+git20190427-1
libsox-fmt-pulse - 14.4.2+git20190427-1
libsox3 - 14.4.2+git20190427-1
sox - 14.4.2+git20190427-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sox package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '14.4.2+git20190427-1').
